column4: ï»¿so i have an old Laptop.. It had WIN2k on it.. but ran TOO SLOW.. its a dell Latitude CSx H500XT (500MHz Proc and 128MB ram) I'd like to put ubuntu on it.. but i don't know what version or where to get it.. It has an CD-ROM drive but no DVD..
i recommende Xubuntu becouse it uses less resources than Ubuntu
pretty much the same i would say
the X in Xubuntu stands for xfce , its another WM . Google it and youll see how it looks
